name: background_abstract_light.jpg
description: A full image of a soft, out-of-focus background with gentle, warm light bokeh effects, creating a dreamy and abstract texture.

name: key_golden.png
description: An ornate, shiny, golden antique key, standing vertically with its head at the top, shot straight on against a white background.

name: background_market_chart_blur.jpg
description: A full image of a digital stock market chart with glowing green and red lines, heavily blurred to create an abstract, moody background.

name: swing_pendulum.png
description: A large, classic, heavy brass pendulum with a polished bob, captured mid-swing with a slight motion blur, on a white background.

name: background_old_map.jpg
description: A full image of a textured, sepia-toned, vintage world map with visible creases, stains, and detailed old-world cartography.

name: compass_vintage.png
description: An antique, polished brass compass with a detailed face showing cardinal directions, lying flat but viewed from a slight top-down angle, on a white background.

name: background_city_night.jpg
description: A full, vibrant photograph of a sprawling city skyline at night, with countless glowing lights from skyscrapers and long-exposure light trails from traffic.

name: bubbles_soap.png
description: A cluster of realistic, translucent soap bubbles of various sizes floating upwards, shimmering with iridescent rainbow colors against a white background.

name: smoke_effect.png
description: Realistic wisps of semi-transparent grey and white smoke gently drifting and swirling in the air, on a white background.

name: background_digital_graveyard.jpg
description: A full image of a dark, digital landscape with glitch effects, corrupted data streams, and faint, broken circuit board patterns.

name: logo_petscom.png
description: The official logo for Pets.com, featuring the iconic sock puppet character, crisp and high-resolution, on a white background.

name: logo_webvan.png
description: The official logo for the company Webvan, clear and high-resolution, on a white background.

name: background_wall_street.jpg
description: A full, dramatic, low-angle shot of an imposing, classical-style Wall Street building at dusk, creating a powerful and serious atmosphere.

name: amazon_logo_old.png
description: The old Amazon.com logo from the late 1990s, with the large 'A' and the flowing river line graphic underneath, on a white background.

name: bomb_cartoon.png
description: A classic, black, round cartoon-style bomb with a thick, lit, sparking fuse, looking like it's about to explode, on a white background.

name: background_graph_paper.jpg
description: A full, clean image of a standard grid of light blue lines on a white sheet of graph paper, serving as a simple background texture.

name: stock_chart_down.png
description: A stylized, thick red line graph on a transparent grid, starting high on the left and crashing dramatically down to the bottom right in a jagged path, on a white background.

name: shattering_glass.png
description: An explosion of sharp, transparent glass shard fragments flying outwards from a central point, as if a pane of glass has just been shattered, on a white background.

name: background_office_desk.jpg
description: A full, top-down view of a founder's wooden office desk at night, covered with rolled-up blueprints, scattered papers, a coffee mug, and lit by a warm desk lamp.

name: dust_particles.png
description: A dense field of small, out-of-focus, glowing white dust particles or motes floating gently in the air, creating an atmospheric effect, on a white background.

name: background_boardroom_tense.jpg
description: A full image of a modern, dark boardroom with a long, polished table reflecting overhead lights, creating a tense and serious atmosphere.

name: scissors_cutting_rope.png
description: A pair of sharp, metallic scissors shown in the act of cutting through a thick, frayed rope, captured at the moment the strands are snapping, on a white background.

name: background_construction_site.jpg
description: A full image of a large construction site at dawn, with silhouettes of cranes and the steel skeleton of a building against a soft, colorful sunrise sky.

name: blueprints_glowing.png
description: A complex network of glowing, bright blue lines representing an architectural blueprint, with no background grid, on a white background.

name: background_static_tv.jpg
description: A full image of a television screen displaying flickering, high-contrast black and white static noise, creating a chaotic and noisy texture.

name: bull_bear_fighting.png
description: Dynamic black silhouettes of a charging bull and a rearing bear locked in combat, viewed from the side, on a white background.

name: background_stormy_sea.jpg
description: A full, dramatic image of a dark, tumultuous ocean during a storm, with huge, crashing waves, sea spray, and a dark, overcast sky.

name: ship_sturdy.png
description: A large, sturdy, old-fashioned wooden sailing ship, viewed from a three-quarters angle, powerfully navigating through waves, on a white background.

name: lighthouse_beam.png
description: A powerful, wide, conical beam of bright white light, emanating from a source on the left and projecting towards the right with visible rays, on a white background.
